scripts.get-hdb: curl -k -s -n https://www.ssz-webdav.stadt-zuerich.ch/HDB_Dropzone/HDB.zip -o input/HDB.zip && unzip -o input/HDB.zip HDB.csv && mv HDB.csv input/hdb.csv
scripts.clean-hdb: cat target/hdb.nt target/hdb_referenznummer.nt | sed '/_:/d' | sed '/<file/d' > target/hdb-clean.nt
scripts.tdb-load: tdbloader --loc target/tdb_ssz target/void.ttl input/static.ttl target/hdb-clean.nt target/hdb-meta.nt target/dimensions.nt
scripts.ssz-lindas-test: env ENDPOINT=https://test.lindas-data.ch:8443/lindas npm-run-all void-timestamp put-void post-hdb post-dimensions
scripts.ssz-lindas-prod: env ENDPOINT=https://lindas-data.ch:8443/lindas npm-run-all void-timestamp put-void post-hdb post-dimensions
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean get-hdb get-dimensions convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp put-void post-hdb post-dimensions
scripts.build-local: npm-run-all clean get-hdb get-dimensions convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-dump
scripts.build-tdb: npm-run-all clean get-hdb get-dimensions convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-dump put-everything
scripts.build-tdb-cache: npm-run-all clean convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump
